Specials codes
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher Advance 2 Archive (GameBoy Advance): Miscellaneous Q&A (Post New Questions Here): Specials codes
By ridderthecritter on Thursday, July 8, 2010 - 10:16 pm:

It has come to my attention that certain words with one letter
alternated always come up with specials. I know of three
cases and there may be more. The _ will represen the letter
to change to get different monsters.

1. _xodia
2. _hoenix!
3. _ LIVES
( on number 3 ther e is a space inbetween the _ and LIVES.)

these may already be known but I didn't see a direct mention
of them yet so if anyone discovers any more, please post
them.

By Thorr on Saturday, July 10, 2010 - 09:24 am:

You need to look harder.

Two of those words are already listed in the password mutation thread.

By Thorr on Saturday, July 10, 2010 - 11:51 am:

The more I think about this, the more it appears that you are going to other sites and getting information, then coming back here and trying to post it as news.

What you fail to realize is that most of the information that you see on sites outside of MRM are full of information that was COPIED from us (aka Stolen) and posted elsewhere.

By ridderthecritter on Saturday, July 10, 2010 - 09:52 pm:

4. _hiteeye

9. _lawer
10. _hones

There are many more but I will stop because I believe that

be changed to get another special monster or a pure
monster(Garu/Garu)

PS I didn't go to any other sites I just noticed the Phoenix
one and exodia one in the password s on mrm and started
expirimenting with all the special codes.

By Infernus on Sunday, July 11, 2010 - 02:33 pm:

This is what we have called password mutation (as Thorr mentioned) in the past. It is not restricted to special breeds, and is elaborated on here:

Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher Advance 2 Archive (GameBoy Advance): The Shrine (Passwords and Unlocking): How to hunt for Passwords

In the case of passwords we don't already have (especially when it comes to specials), it would probably be best to post them in the password list for whatever monster they generate.
